Recommended Treatment: Adjuvant systemic chemotherapy with carboplatin and paclitaxel in combination with external beam pelvic radiation therapy, with consideration of vaginal brachytherapy per NCCN guidelines for Stage III uterine serous carcinoma.
Description: High-grade serous adenocarcinoma of the endometrium with invasion to the uterine serosa and parametrial tissues (pT3a N0 Mx), consistent with FIGO Stage IIIA.
Patient Notes: Your report shows a high-grade uterine cancer that has spread to the outer surface of the uterus but not to the lymph nodes.  The recommended treatment is a combination of chemotherapy (carboplatin and paclitaxel) and radiation therapy, with a possible vaginal radiation boost, to help reduce the risk of the cancer returning.

verification.assessment: The extraction faithfully captures the key diagnostic, staging, and treatment information from the pathology report and aligns with NCCN recommendations.
